LanguageData.DarkDescent_DetonatePiggyDescription: Overheats the tesla coils causing a catastrophic meltdown. The coils release large pulses of electrical energy, and then explode, rather violently\n\nThe servant 'tesla' likely won't survive this
LanguageData.DarkDescent_SettingRavenousHungerMin: Minimum hunger percentage for ravenous hunger to activate
LanguageData.DarkDescent_SettingInciteMin: Minimum hunger percentage for ravenous hunger to incite
LanguageData.DarkDescent_SettingInciteChance: Chance another swine is incited if all other requirements are met
LanguageData.DarkDescent_SettingVitaeThirstTicks: Number of ticks until harvesters enrage due to vitae thirst
